functions.tag: {display:{Name:'{"translate":"天之波霊弓","color":"dark_aqua","bold":true,"italic":false}',Lore:['[{"text":"❖ ","color":"3","italic":false},{"translate":"%1$s%2$s(V)","color":"white","with":[{"translate":"陰陽の"},{"translate":"刻印"}]}]','{"translate":"古来より祀られる伝承の弓","color":"dark_aqua","italic":false}','{"translate":"重ねられた信仰により、霊性を帯びている。","color":"dark_aqua","italic":false}','[{"text":"","color":"white","italic":false},{"text":"H","font":"icon","color":"light_purple"},{"text":" フォトニックレーザー"}]','{"text":"---TUSBMemory---","obfuscated":true,"color":"gray","italic":false}']},Engraving:{EnchantID:"陰陽",Tier:5},Skill:{Type:"TUSBMemory",Initializing:1b,Job:"狩人",SkillID:350,Name:"フォトニックレーザー",Level:1,Interval:30,Trigger:"弓を構えて矢を撃つ",Count:10},AttributeModifiers:[{AttributeName:"generic.knockback_resistance",Name:"カスタム",Amount:0.42,Operation:0,UUID:[I;11,0,0,20],Slot:"mainhand"},{AttributeName:"generic.movement_speed",Name:"カスタム",Amount:-0.14,Operation:1,UUID:[I;11,0,0,31],Slot:"mainhand"},{AttributeName:"generic.attack_damage",Name:"カスタム",Amount:72,Operation:0,UUID:[I;11,0,0,40],Slot:"mainhand"}]}
